# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Mail Carrier
The Mail Carrier is responsible for delivering mail to the crew. They're given a mail bag and even a specialist launcher to help deliver it. Successful delivers earn Spesos for Cargo, which is a very good way to make decent income with zero risk.
Neither snow nor rain nor heat nor gloom of night stays these couriers from the swift completion of their appointed rounds
# Do - Deliver the mail.
## Don't - Lick all the stamp glue.
